all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
For I know him, that he will command his children and his household after him, and they shall keep the way of the Lord, to do justice and judgment; that the Lord may bring upon Abraham that which he hath spoken of him.
Genesis 18:19
Quote of the Day
"Cry unto God. Turn to the temple. Cling to your covenants. Serve the Lord, His Church, and others with sacrifice and thanksgiving."
Elder Matthew S. Holland | 1 Oct 2025General Conference
